### Roles

Bringing satellite telemetry expertise to the trackyverse and to the ATO. Developer of [ArgosQC](https://github.com/ianjonsen/ArgosQC/), [aniMotum](https://github.com/ianjonsen/aniMotum/) and co-developer of [remora](https://github.com/IMOS-AnimalTracking/remora/) with Fabrice Jaine, Yuri Niella et al. Now co-developing ArgosQC with OTN.
